citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
The 5 camels are out on pasture and have access to a round bale of hay. They are thin as ribs, top of hips and
shoulder blades are visible. These animals need to be examined by a veterinarian to determine cause of weight loss
and proper treatment.
CORRECT BY : 9-21-15
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the ranch manager.
Owner was contacted by phone for exit briefing during the inspection.

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)           DIRECT
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
The 5 camels are out on pasture and have access to a round bale of hay. They are thin as ribs, top of hips and
shoulder blades are visible. These animals need to be examined by a veterinarian to determine cause of weight loss
and proper treatment.
CORRECT BY : 9-21-15 
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the ranch manager. 
Owner was contacted by phone for exit briefing during the inspection.
